content:
Do we have a current invite link? Apparently they keep expiring.

Invite link for a new category theory online space ---v Intended for everyone from researchers to the curious. (Zulip provides tools for everyone to customise what they see) Feel free to share this link anywhere you think is appropriate https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/join/f31tmd0bz8zs2lqcgqlsjnsi/

- julesh (@_julesh_)

Joshua Meyers said:

Do we have a current invite link? Apparently they keep expiring.

https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/join/5vs67zwsr9cwhjxd850ragjm/
And there isn't much we can do about it, except making it open access, but we talked about it a few weeks ago and decided it is not necessarily a good idea
What's the status on invite links? Is there a working one currently?
Invite links can be generated by mods and live for 10 days before self destructing. Here is a fresh one: https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/join/2mjmt3rkgqzne73pg4nwygdz/

The one on Azimuth is working now:

https://johncarlosbaez.wordpress.com/2020/03/25/category-theory-community-server/

It will eventually expire... until someone reminds me to get a new one.
Do we have a current invite link?
The above one doesn't seem to work.
